{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3279333,"name":"","username":"Vortex148","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/v/3e96dc/{size}.png","created_at":"2024-01-10T06:45:34.487Z","cooked":"

Hey all, Ive been working on a swerve drive using mk4i and all falcons. So far, I have based my code off of team 364’s code and have came across a bit of an issue. Whenever I drive forward or strafe, my front two wheels are inverted. However, whenever I steer, the motors move in the correct direction. Any help would be appreciated. Repo Link: GitHub - Vortex148/SwerveDrive

Thanks

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":3,"updated_at":"2024-01-10T15:59:37.660Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":19,"reads":113,"readers_count":112,"score":117.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":449146,"topic_slug":"swerve-drive-wheels-driving-inward","display_username":"","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":3,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"https://github.com/Vortex148/SwerveDrive","internal":false,"reflection":false,"title":"GitHub - Vortex148/SwerveDrive","clicks":8}],"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":62423,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/swerve-drive-wheels-driving-inward/449146/1","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3279960,"name":"","username":"weepfrog","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/w/e95f7d/{size}.png","created_at":"2024-01-10T19:17:33.444Z","cooked":"

are you able to strafe while steering without it inverting? I think you might have a problem with your steer offsets. I don’t know if these are constants that you found but if it’s not you will most likely have to find your own individual ones. There should be a ton of docs on how to find your offset

this line in constants seems to be where it is pulling the constants

  public static final COTSTalonFXSwerveConstants chosenModule =  //TODO: This must be tuned to specific robot
        COTSTalonFXSwerveConstants.SDS.MK4i.Falcon500(COTSTalonFXSwerveConstants.SDS.MK4i.driveRatios.L1);`
